name: RG

services.title: Art Direction
services.description: We help with the creation and development of online advertising ideas, with particular focus on their visual appearance.

services.title: Branding
services.description: We design key brand elements such as the logo, color scheme, typography, and other design components that makes your brand stand out from competitors.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: We build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

services.title: 3D Design
services.description: We combine creative design and technical skills to build striking 3D visualisations that bring your project to life.

resume.description:
As a motivated software developer, I bring a versatile skill set that spans both front-
end and back-end web development. Well-versed with NodeJS,PHP, MongoDB, Firebase, MySQL, Javascript, ReactJS.

experiences.position: Back End Developer at Biltek Design and Software Inc.
experiences.bullets: I worked as a Back-end Developer on numerous corporate promotional and e-commerce website projects, Primarily using PHP | AJAX | MySQL | JavaScript.

experiences.position: Game Developer at MAG Game Studio
experiences.bullets: Developed hyper-casual hybrid-casual and puzzle games, Primarily using Unity | C# | OOP
Developed user interfaces and established a connection between database., Primarily using ReactJS | NodeJS | MongoDB
